data.oai_dc:dc: plot and tree data Abaco and Eleuthera

Location and environmental data for 42 vegetation plots (10 m radius circular) located on Abaco and Eleuthera in The Bahamas, collected between 2009-2013 followed by species and diameter at 1.3m height on tree for each tree >=5cm diameter in each plot.
Vegetation classification|Broadleaf subtropical evergreen forest|Forest community|Tropical seasonal evergreen forest
